tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE genomic_data (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  species_name VARCHAR(50),
  sequence TEXT,
  gene_name VARCHAR(50),
  chromosome VARCHAR(10),
  start_position INT,
  end_position INT
);

CREATE TABLE GenomicData (
    Id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    OrganismName VARCHAR(255),
    GenomeSize INT,
    SequencingPlatform VARCHAR(100),
    SequencingDepth FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE ComparativeGenomics (
    ComparisonId INT PRIMARY KEY,
    ReferenceOrganism VARCHAR(255),
    TargetOrganism VARCHAR(255),
    NumSharedGenes INT,
    EvolutionaryDistance FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE mutations (
    mutation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    gene_id INT NOT NULL,
    mutation_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    mutation_position INT,
    mutation_effect VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE Genes (
  gene_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  gene_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  species_id INT,
  chromosome_id INT,
  sequence TEXT
);
